dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: A Python wrapper for the extremely fast Blosc compression library
dependent_to.name: py-blosc

dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for the C-Blosc2 library.
dependent_to.name: py-blosc2

dependent_to.description:
DeepSpeed library. DeepSpeed enables world's most powerful language
models like MT-530B and BLOOM. It is an easy-to-use deep learning
optimization software suite that powers unprecedented scale and speed
for both training and inference.
dependent_to.name: py-deepspeed

dependent_to.description:
Devito is a Python package to implement optimized stencil computation.
(e.g., finite differences, image processing, machine learning) from
high-level symbolic problem definitions. Devito builds on SymPy and
employs automated code generation and just-in-time compilation to
execute optimized computational kernels on several computer platforms,
including CPUs, GPUs, and clusters thereof.
dependent_to.name: py-devito

dependent_to.description:
Numcodecs is a Python package providing buffer compression and
transformation codecs for use in data storage and communication
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-numcodecs

dependent_to.description: A pytest fixture for benchmarking code.
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-benchmark

dependent_to.description:
PyTables is a package for managing hierarchical datasets and designed to
efficiently and easily cope with extremely large amounts of data.
dependent_to.name: py-tables

dependent_to.description:
A collection of open source benchmarks used to evaluate PyTorch
performance.
dependent_to.name: py-torchbenchmark

description: Get CPU info with pure Python 2 & 3
name: py-py-cpuinfo

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
